title: I'm pretty sure Riot is ignoring me.
body:
So 2 weeks ago August 22 of 2016 My main account Summoner name is: iBeard
Was hacked and had an RP purchases to a total of 200$
Clearly i took action changed my passwords and credentials for just about everything including the account.

Now here is the weird thing after changing my password i went to go log in and i got the "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region" but i changed the password and i even did the  don't remember username and when it emails me it says "iBeard North America" So it should let me log in right??

Now for the fun part. I put in a support ticket that day in hopes i can get my account back and refunded my 200$ like we are supposed to. I even contacted PayPal and my bank just panicking hoping to figure out whats happening,

Now two days later i get an email saying that my account has performed actions that are in violation of League of Legends Terms of Use. 
Mind you it doesn't tell me how, when, or why just that the account is banned 
(VERRRY difficult to do since my account was inactive, right?) 

A week goes by and i'm starting to think, "Okay Riot hasn't responded maybe they lost the ticket or i put in the wrong category"
So i place in another ticket on the 29th thinking a week has passes it isn't a bad idea to make sure they still have it 
Right? am I wrong?

Now another week has gone by (put in a ticket yesterday with it being a holiday probably gonna get lost nbd )
But still absolutely no response from riot and it's been a total of 2 weeks.

TLDR
So long story short i'm annoyed that i spent 200$ for someone hacking me and i didn't personally receive, and even more so annoyed that the account i have way too much $$ put into is completely unavailable to me and when I try to contact support i'm getting absolutely no response?

Can't even give much accurate info like when account was made since i cant even get into my account nor' can i even check my first purchases for the same reason.

If i can get any help on what i should do (other than put in a support ticket because clearly they are not paying attention to them) or at least mine
i would greatly appreciate it.

replies.body: I looked into this for you and found that an account specialist reached out to you in your initial ticket, and asked some questions to verify and help restore access to the account.  It doesn't look like you replied to that ticket, and your current ticket has been escalated to a specialist to be reviewed.  A specialist will reply as soon as possible, just be ready to answer any follow-ups to help you out.  They will respond to your ticket as soon as possible!
Now is it going to go to my email?

Yup, you should be receiving an email notification.  Unfortunately, I can't share more information on the specifics to your account due to the nature of sensitive account details on a public venue.  Make sure to check your spam folders if you aren't seeing them!  If you are also having problems with your email or submitting tickets through the support site, you can also send an email to support@riotgames.com with your preferred address.  Good luck!
I've checked the email that is linked to the specific account and i haven't received an email except for the one stating my account was banned and the numerous times that i have changed my password

have you checked your spam? sometimes support messages may accidentally be placed there by your emails chat filter. If thats not the case maybe just double check and give it a day or so... I'm sure that when they get a second rioters can provide you with whatever you need!
